title: [Student Dormitory] 10/1 Smart Power System Implementation Notes and Precautions
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處生活輔導組 - 陳怡秀 - yishoue@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6212
對象： 全校學生
標題： [Student Dormitory] 10/1 Smart Power System Implementation Notes and Precautions
日期： Fri, 20 Sep 2024 11:36:40 +0800

Dear All,
This semester, the smart power system will be officially launched at 12:00 noon on 10/1 (Tue). Before the smart power system is implemented, the electricity bill will be calculated by meter reading, and the total electricity consumption will be calculated based on the number of occupants in the dormitory.
In order to ensure the process of implementation goes smoothly, students are reminded to recharge the dormitory public card or personal student ID at the convenience store before 12:00 noon on 10/1 (Tue), and then go to the dormitory lobby to top-up through the smart power kiosk.  The topped-up amount of the smart power system will be used for the electricity in the room. For the use of the smart power system and FAQs, please refer to the description of the system. The link is as follows: https://rb005.ndhu.edu.tw/p/412- 1005-18658.php

Your safety, OSA's delight!
Student Living Services Division Office of Student Affairs
